00014 
00015     // TimerControl: 
00016     var TimerControl = function(){};
00017     TimerControl.prototype = {
00018       initialize: function( timeout ) {
00019         this['timer'];
00020         this['TIMEOUT'] = timeout;
00021         this['interupt'] = true;
00022         this['subscribers'] = new Array();
00023         this['ontimeout'] = new EventHandler( this,
00024           // notify subscribers and restart timer
00025           function( context ) {
00026             context.notify();
00027             if ( !context.interupt ) { context.start(); }
00028           }
00029         );
00030       },
00031 
00032       start: function() {
00033         this['interupt']=false;
00034         this['timer'] = setTimeout(this.ontimeout,this['TIMEOUT']);
00035       },
00036 
00037       stop: function() {
00038         this['interupt']=true;
00039       },
00040 
00041       // add observers to subscribers queue
00042       subscribe: function( observer ) {
00043         this.subscribers.push( observer );
00044       },
00045 
00046       // notify observers wen an event has occured
00047       notify: function( key, value ) {
00048         for( var i=0; i<this.subscribers.length; i++ ) {
00049           this.subscribers[i].update();
00050         }
00051       }
00052     }
00053
